author: gsim
msg: Revised transactional options to perftest as they could not be used on older boost versions due to ambiguity.
Refactored TxAccept to avoid excessive testing and searching for delivery records.

author: elecharny
msg: Remove dthe incorrect @override annotations to fix some compilation errors.

author: clement
msg: Add tests on the invocation of super contructors with the bundle context in parameter.

author: jdillon
msg: command and alias meta mappers now handle remove

author: tdonovan
msg: dbd odbc driver - don't segfault when params is NULL.
Empty params are now OK.  connect will fail with a more useful message.
Changed transaction processing to be like the other dbd drivers.
After an error in a transaction, all queries/selects will fail until
end_transaction unless mode is set to APR_DBD_TRANSACTION_IGNORE_ERRORS
